biomes.name: Grasslands
biomes.flavor: A verdant paradise of sprawling hillsides dotted with trees and shrubbery.

biomes.name: Forest
biomes.flavor: Light filtered though the lush canopy provides a heavenly atmosphere, until night falls.

biomes.name: Swamps
biomes.flavor: On the fringe it appears to be a thriving wetland. Deeper in, the air is thick with noxious haze, unknown sounds permeate the stagnant atmosphere, and the dense foliage blocks the sunlight.

biomes.name: Mountains
biomes.flavor: Appearing serene and peaceful from a distnace, the mountains are a craggy and harsh enviornment. Its peaks stretch above the clouds, hiding what exists beyond the earth below.

biomes.name: Plains
biomes.flavor: A wind-swept valley hidden by the surrounding mountains. These fertile lands are home to many grazing beasts and other natural resources.

biomes.name: Ruined City
biomes.flavor: Crumbling spires that once touched the sky now lie broken. Grand structures now give way to the elements. The sprawling ruins hint at a once vibrant civilation. No evidence remains of their fate.

biomes.name: Caldera
biomes.flavor: Swirling formations of old rock that once flowed like rivers have shaped the landscape into a treacherous domain. While not a welcoming sight, those brave enough may be rewarded.

biomes.name: Valhalla
biomes.flavor: Peace. Merriment. Food and drink. Prove yourself to earn your place.

houseAddOns.name: Blast Furnace
houseAddOns.tooltip: Technology that brings even more advanced arms and armor.

houseAddOns.name: Smelter
houseAddOns.tooltip: The basis for crafting advanced arms and armor.

houseAddOns.name: Kiln
houseAddOns.tooltip: A staple of any forge.

houseAddOns.name: Fermenter
houseAddOns.tooltip: Brew your favorite mead and other sweets.

houseAddOns.name: Cooking Pot
houseAddOns.tooltip: A culinary tool for advanced recipes.

houseAddOns.name: Cooking Station
houseAddOns.tooltip: The basis for staving off hunger.

houseAddOns.name: Windmill
houseAddOns.tooltip: Harnesses the power of the wind to process nature's staples.

houseAddOns.name: Spinning Wheel
houseAddOns.tooltip: A tool for creating fine threads and rope.

houseAddOns.name: Bee Hive
houseAddOns.tooltip: A sustainable food source.

houseAddOns.name: Hammer
houseAddOns.tooltip: The start of any homestead.

houseAddOns.name: Workbench
houseAddOns.tooltip: The foundation of making a house a home, and more.

houseAddOns.name: Chopping Block
houseAddOns.tooltip: Woodcutting is necessary work to survive.

houseAddOns.name: Tanning Rack
houseAddOns.tooltip: A necessity for creating basic arms and armor.

houseAddOns.name: Adze
houseAddOns.tooltip: A tool used for fine woodworking.

houseAddOns.name: Tool Rack
houseAddOns.tooltip: An organized workshop allows focusing on more advanced projects.

houseAddOns.name: Forge
houseAddOns.tooltip: An advanced tool for metallurgy.

houseAddOns.name: Forge Cooler
houseAddOns.tooltip: Better heat control means better craftsmanship.

houseAddOns.name: Anvil
houseAddOns.tooltip: Used for shaping soft metals.

houseAddOns.name: Smith's Anvil
houseAddOns.tooltip: Necessary for shaping hard metals.

houseAddOns.name: Forge Toolrack
houseAddOns.tooltip: An organized workshop allows focusing on more advanced projects.

houseAddOns.name: Bellows
houseAddOns.tooltip: Better heat control means better craftsmanship.

houseAddOns.name: Artisan Table
houseAddOns.tooltip: Imbued with magical properties for advanced metallurgy.

houseAddOns.name: Stonecutter
houseAddOns.tooltip: With the strength of stone, a house can become a fortress.

houseAddOns.name: Campfire
houseAddOns.tooltip: A comfort for cooking, shelter, rest, and more.

houseAddOns.name: Hearth
houseAddOns.tooltip: A functional flame, but even more beautiful than a basic campfire.

houseAddOns.name: Hanging Brazier
houseAddOns.tooltip: Provides light, and assurance, in the darkness.

houseAddOns.name: Deer Rug
houseAddOns.tooltip: The soft deer skin helps to sleep through the night

houseAddOns.name: Wolf Rug
houseAddOns.tooltip: The warm, thick furs make sleep even more delightful.

houseAddOns.name: Steer Rug
houseAddOns.tooltip: The dense hide provides a soft floor.

houseAddOns.name: Banners
houseAddOns.tooltip: An inspiration to greet you at the dawn of each day.

houseAddOns.name: Table
houseAddOns.tooltip: A social space for relaxation

houseAddOns.name: Chairs
houseAddOns.tooltip: After a long day, a good sit can rejuvinate.

houseAddOns.name: Throne
houseAddOns.tooltip: A commanding seat to invigorate.

houseAddOns.name: Comfortable Beds
houseAddOns.tooltip: With as much warmth as you need, this soft bed keeps worry at bay.

battleLog:
You have challenged the mighty The Gale! Do not fear, for even in death you may be rewarded for such bravery.
Gertrud The Eagle hits The Gale for 45 damage and uses 30 stamina!
